title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When clicking on other buttons, it also makes the bell sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not beep when SWT.MULTI is chosen.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Go to the Text tab.
4. Click on 'Styles' and select SWT.SINGLE.
5. Click on 'Styles' again and select SWT.MULTI.
